title: WasmPlugin
description: WasmPlugin is the Schema for the wasmplugins API

spec.description: Extend the functionality provided by the Istio proxy through WebAssembly filters. See more details at: https://istio.io/docs/reference/config/proxy_extensions/wasm-plugin.html

failStrategy.description:
Specifies the failure behavior for the plugin due to fatal errors.

Valid Options: FAIL_CLOSE, FAIL_OPEN

imagePullPolicy.description:
The pull behaviour to be applied when fetching Wasm module by either OCI image or `http/https`.

Valid Options: IfNotPresent, Always

imagePullSecret.description: Credentials to use for OCI image pulling.

match.description: Specifies the criteria to determine which traffic is passed to WasmPlugin.

mode.description:
Criteria for selecting traffic by their direction.

Valid Options: CLIENT, SERVER, CLIENT_AND_SERVER

ports.description: Criteria for selecting traffic by their destination port.

phase.description:
Determines where in the filter chain this `WasmPlugin` is to be injected.

Valid Options: AUTHN, AUTHZ, STATS

pluginConfig.description: The configuration that will be passed on to the plugin.

pluginName.description: The plugin name to be used in the Envoy configuration (used to be called `rootID`).

priority.description: Determines ordering of `WasmPlugins` in the same `phase`.

selector.description: Criteria used to select the specific set of pods/VMs on which this plugin configuration should be applied.

matchLabels.description: One or more labels that indicate a specific set of pods/VMs on which a policy should be applied.

sha256.description: SHA256 checksum that will be used to verify Wasm module or OCI container.

group.description: group is the group of the target resource.

kind.description: kind is kind of the target resource.

name.description: name is the name of the target resource.

namespace.description: namespace is the namespace of the referent.

group.description: group is the group of the target resource.

name.description: name is the name of the target resource.

namespace.description: namespace is the namespace of the referent.

type.description:
Specifies the type of Wasm Extension to be used.

Valid Options: HTTP, NETWORK

url.description: URL of a Wasm module or OCI container.

env.description: Specifies environment variables to be injected to this VM.

valueFrom.description:
Source for the environment variable's value.

Valid Options: INLINE, HOST

conditions.description: Current service state of the resource.

lastProbeTime.description: Last time we probed the condition.

lastTransitionTime.description: Last time the condition transitioned from one status to another.

message.description: Human-readable message indicating details about last transition.

reason.description: Unique, one-word, CamelCase reason for the condition's last transition.

status.description: Status is the status of the condition.

type.description: Type is the type of the condition.

observedGeneration.description: Resource Generation to which the Reconciled Condition refers.

validationMessages.description: Includes any errors or warnings detected by Istio's analyzers.

documentationUrl.description: A url pointing to the Istio documentation for this specific error type.

level.description:
Represents how severe a message is.

Valid Options: UNKNOWN, ERROR, WARNING, INFO

code.description: A 7 character code matching `^IST[0-9]{4}$` intended to uniquely identify the message type.

name.description: A human-readable name for the message type.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
